name: The Expierence Fostercare
description: In this simple horror visual novel you'll entail on an epic adventure! Here at The Expierence Fostercare you will meet many foes who will embark you to be your..friend? But who, choose wisely.. For there is only a certain amount of time before summer ends and you and friends must escape before you get caught by your soon to be caretakers for the whole summer!!
